participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring, adventurous, and open-minded, Emily is dedicated to her studies and loves exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park. I'm interested in trying new things and expanding my horizons. My favorite band is The Avett Brothers. I am 6 foot tall. I am still a student, but I am going to be a nurse.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Creative, sociable, and passionate about performing, Michael enjoys connecting with people through music and his work.
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals. I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others. I work as an electrician. My father was a famous actor. I like listening to all genres of music except country music.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you for asking!
That is great to hear! What are you up to today?
I am currently in class learning about nursing.
Oh that is very interesting! What do you enjoy most about nursing?
I enjoy the idea of helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That is wonderful! I am sure you will be a great nurse. What is your favorite band?
My favorite band is The Avett Brothers.
I have never heard of them before! What kind of music do they play?
Oh, I will have to check them out! What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my friends and family, going to the park, and listening to music.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your time!
Thank you! What about you, what do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy performing on stage, I work as an electrician, and I like listening to music
